info.short_description: A sex work-friendly social space.
info.full_description:
NSFW content warning! Instance admins: please silence us to prevent NSFW avatars/content from appearing in your federated timelines until we can figure out a solution.

In light of the FOSTA/SESTA bill and the recent shadow-banning of our accounts, we‚Äôve decided to take social into our own hands.

This is an open and free community and your space to advertise, release new shoots, announce tour dates and whatever else you‚Äôd like to do! It‚Äôs in your hands. It works similar to previous social networks but it‚Äôs censorship free!

info.short_description: Fast, secure and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Join us!
info.full_description:
Why should you sign up on mstdn.io?

This instance is not focused on any theme or subject, feel free to talk about whatever you want. Although the main language is english, we accept every single language and country.

We're connected to the whole OStatus/ActivityPub fediverse and we do not block any foreign instance nor user.

We do have rules (see below), but the goal is to have responsible users. So far we haven't had any issue with moderation

The instance uses a powerful server to ensure speed and stability, and it has good uptime. We follow state-of-the-art security practices. See below for more technical details

Also, we have over 300 custom emojis to unleash your meming potential üëç

info.short_description: Mamot.fr is the mastodon social network instance maintained by La Quadrature du Net, digital freedom organization based in Paris
info.full_description:
mamot.fr is maintained by La Quadrature du Net sysadmin team, a team of volunteers who monitor, upgrade and answer to reports on the services provided by La Quadrature to everyone. We also provide Jabber, Jitsi meet, Searx and Etherpad service to anyone who need it. 
Our policy has been specifically written by our team, and is available in French here : https://mamot.fr/terms

info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde √©ducatif et d√©sormais tourn√©e vers l'√©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un r√©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte √† 2001.

Ces projets sont anim√©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une m√™me volont√© : promouvoir les libert√©s num√©riques.

Le respect des libert√©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats l√©gaux (les licences libres), est au c≈ìur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en ma√Ætrise de l'outil num√©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant √† faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, cl√©s USB, installateur‚Ä¶) ;
    de cr√©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'√©dition‚Ä¶) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet D√©googlisons Internet).

Pr√©sent√© comme une ¬´ porte d'entr√©e dans le monde du Libre ¬ª, le r√©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communaut√© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends. For and by the chaos community.
info.full_description:
chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours on our about page that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist.

info.short_description: Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.
info.full_description:
Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.

Users who don't respect rules will be silenced, or suspended if they harass other people or if the the violation is considered too large.

Art‚ÄΩ üé®üì∏‚úèÔ∏èüé•üñ•Ô∏èüïπÔ∏èüñºÔ∏èüé∂üí°üí¨
info.full_description:
Art‚ÄΩ üé®üì∏‚úèÔ∏èüé•üñ•Ô∏èüïπÔ∏èüñºÔ∏èüé∂üí°üí¨‚ÄîArtists creating, illustrating, sketching, singing, musically inclined, photographing, sculpture, discussing & daily living too.
Mastodon.art ‚Äî a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Replace your twitter, tumblr & Facebook! Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life. Mastodon.art doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal information‚Äîyour information is never for sale. Export & leave for another instance anytime. No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting. Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying ‚Äî your account will be deleted. No Porn, No Loli, Artistic Form, No Bots & Respect Others
info.topic: Art, Music, Photography, Sculpture, Discussion & Generalistic too.

info.short_description: The cutest general purpose safe instance. We love science and beautiful things. LGBT+ and PoC are welcome.
info.full_description:
Octodon.social is a general purpose instance, where topics are mostly technical and scientific, but there's a bit of everything.
Federates with everything, allows nearly everything lawful in France.
Moderation policy is explained in details on our /about/more page; it is a pretty safe space. Harassment, bullying, or hate speech are not tolerated.
As the definition is often forgotten and altered, a safe space is a community where people (especially women, PoC and LGBT+) are protected from oppression and everyday harassment. Our goal is for every member to feel safe and welcome. (but of course that doesn't apply if you break local rules by being aggressive towards someone else, for instance)

info.short_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct.
info.full_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct. Blocks instances with hate speech and/or illegal content.

info.short_description: Welcome to your niu world ! üíó We are a cute and loving international community ÔºØ(‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)ÔºØ !
info.full_description:
We are a moderated instance, that aren't supporting harassment nor hateful speech, so what set us apart? Well, unlike many instances like us, we won't prevent you to interact with instances that aren't respecting our rules.
The main language used here is English, but for most of us this isn't our main language, so it's a great place to learn! 

Here, we are open to any subjects, but the main ones are:
- Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics
- Gaming / e-Sport / Retro / Speedrun
- Programming / Security / IT stuffs
- Sometime politics / World events
- Pictures and story from around the world <3 

If you want more infos, visit our instance ^-^ !

info.short_description: Game development!
info.full_description: Discussions by game developers, or about game development. Art, Design, Technology, QA, Support etc.; all aspects of game development topics are welcome.

info.short_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone.
info.full_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct.

info.short_description: An instance for researchers, teachers and students at all levels, one that you can be proud to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference
info.full_description:
A Mastodon instance for academics

Scholar Social is meant for: researchers, grad students, undergrads, academically inclined high schoolers, educators of all levels, journal editors, research assistants, librarians, archivists, administrators‚Äîanyone involved in academia who is willing to engage with others respectfully.

"A Mastodon profile you can be proud to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference"

info.short_description: A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research.
info.full_description:
A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research. Share your work, discuss, critique, and ask for help! Come one, come all:

‚Üí creative coders
‚Üí data scientists and visualizers
‚Üí generative artists
‚Üí visual researchers, curators, and critics
‚Üí anyone else data- or visualization-adjacent

If you are curious about the world and creativity, you are welcome here.

info.short_description: Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance and federates with most instances in the Fediverse. Online since April 2017.
info.full_description:
Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance that's been running since April of 2017. We federate with other instances unless their community values are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service. Our primary languages are English and German, but other languages are more than welcome.

Mastodon.at is maintained by an experienced sysadmin. User data is backed up to multiple locations at least once every hour to avoid data loss. We are hosted in France, with an additional server location in S√£o Paulo, Brazil.

info.short_description: Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of a few other instances.
info.full_description: Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website, aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. Federation is fully open, and operated in blacklist mode only, with the list being publicly available.

info.short_description: This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it.
info.full_description: This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

info.short_description: A queer community of monsters, creatures, and lovers of strangeness.
info.full_description:
Monsterpit is a small, friendly, and very queer community of monster and creature lovers.

We provide a relaxing space for folks to embrace strangeness with a love that spans from casual admiration to kinky teratophile.

Through monsters, we can express queer identity, sexuality, and spirituality in a world that often fears us.

Whether you love the strange or are the strange, you'll find a home here.
info.topic: monsters, creatures, queer, kink, art, roleplay, general

info.short_description: foxes and fox-like creatures
info.full_description: The Vulpine Club is a community for foxes and their associates, friends, fans, and other furry (and non-furry) creatures. We're pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

info.short_description: Writing Exchange is a small, focused community for poets, writers, bloggers, and anyone else who makes things.
info.full_description: We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically.

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen f√ºr alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: We welcome all LGBT+ people and allies all around the world! :)
info.full_description: We welcome all LGBT+ people and allies all around the world! We want to make this a friendly place and we try our best to help members out if they ever need. :)

info.short_description: Computer Fairies is a Mastodon instance that aims to be as queer, friendly and furry as possible. We welcome all kinds of computer fairies!
info.full_description:
Guidelines:
1. We (the admins) will not tolerate any sort of discrimination
2. Basically, don't be a jerk and you'll be ok
3. We reserve the right to remove anyone from this instance for being a jerk at our discretion, after fair warning depending on the case.

Blocked Instances:
All blocked instances have media blocks regardless of block type.
Please refer to https://computerfairi.es/about/more for an up-to-date list of blocked instances.

info.full_description:
A Mastodon instance for maths people. We have LaTeX rendering in our toots!

Operated by @christianp@mathstodon.xyz and @ColinTheMathmo@mathstodon.xyz.
info.topic: Mathematics, math, maths, whatever you call it

info.short_description: Unixcorns project instance https://unixcorn.org, mostly french speaking
info.full_description:
Une instance Mastodon tenue √† jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn. H√©berg√©e en Allemagne, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais nous vous invitons √† lire l'ensemble des r√®gles d'utilisation. Notre mod√©ration est collaborative, n‚Äôh√©sitez surtout pas √† rapporter tout contenu probl√©matique !

Notre instance est bien s√ªr r√©gie par des r√®gles sp√©cifiques. Premi√®rement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, √¢gisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc n‚Äôest tol√©r√©. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non d√©sign√© comme tel avec un ‚ÄúContent Warning‚Äù (CW) m√®nent aussi √† une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans pr√©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.
Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s √† utiliser la fonction de rapport (‚ÄúReport‚Äù) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant √† l‚Äôencontre de nos r√®gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne r√¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.
Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant l‚Äôaspect activiste de notre d√©marche. Si vous √™tes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous n‚Äô√™tes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si l‚Äô√©criture inclusive vous d√©range sachez que vous n'√™tes qu'√† un clic de souris de la sortie.
Notre r√©seau social, et son r√©seau entier selon nous, est d√©di√© √† la r√©appropriation des moyens de communication et √† la cr√©ation de communaut√©s meilleures pour le collectif. Les cat√©gories de personnes cit√©es dans le paragraphe pr√©c√©dent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant m√™me dans le sens contraire) √† la r√©alisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur pr√©sence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

info.short_description: Gaming without the 'gate
info.full_description: Elekk is a Mastodon instance for games of any type - from chess to World of Warcraft. We are explicitly feminist and inclusionary, and reject Gamergate and the culture that spawned it.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for people who love FOSS/Linux.
info.full_description:
What is fosstodon.org?

Fosstodon is a Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it. Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

info.short_description: A community where it is safe to talk about witchcraft, woo, and various occult things. We talk about pretty much everything though.
info.full_description:
Occult Camp is an mastodon instance focused on spitituality, witchcraft and various shades of woo. The goal of Occult Camp is to allow people who are serious about getting into witchcraft or shamanism or various other things to have a place to get together and talk with people who have been proacticing for a bit, and to just have a place to go to share stories and talk with likeminded people.

If you dislike "censorship", feminists, SJWs, and other socially minded people, this is definitely not the instance for you.

info.short_description: This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.
info.full_description:
The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better. 

Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".


 This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon
The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...

info.short_description: Instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. Mostly French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.
info.full_description:
oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.

R√®gles :

Aucun type de harc√®lement ou de (micro-)agression n'est tol√©r√©, qu'elles soient personnelles ou rel√®vent d'un syst√®me oppressif (misogynie, racisme, LGBTphobies/queerphobie, validisme, etc.). De m√™me pour la promotion de ces oppressions et des mouvements politiques associ√©s (masculinisme, supr√©macisme, etc.).

La pornographie et la nudit√© sont tol√©r√©es pour le moment, mais doivent √™tre obligatoirement indiqu√©es comme NSFW. De m√™me pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un Content Warning appropri√©.

Sauf exception accord√©e par l'admin, les publicit√©s sont bannies de cette instance.

This is an instance for BanG Dream & Bushiroad contents & Nijigen --- Boom Dream Party. 
Everyone can join in even though you are not a Bangdreamer. 
You know, this is a Chinese instance. If you don't like Chinese toots, please don't join in.

info.short_description: Because Mastodon rocks !
info.full_description: Small and relaxed instance. 100% chill.

info.short_description: im@stodon.org is an unofficial mastodon instance for the non-Japanese community of fans of THE IDOLM@STER.
info.full_description:

info.short_description: Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s.
info.full_description:
Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s. Nous sommes principalement francophones, mais vous √™tes les bienvenu¬∑e¬∑s quelque soit votre langue.

Les r√®gles de Eldritch Caf√© sont les suivantes‚ÄØ:
1. Ne participez pas √† du harc√®lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
2. Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations priv√©es, sauf √† l‚Äô√©quipe de mod√©ration en cas de signalement.
3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en g√©n√©ral vous vaudront d‚Äô√™tre suspendu¬∑e, m√™me utilis√©¬∑e¬∑s dans des conversations non-publiques.
4. Il est permis de poster de la pornographie ou de la nudit√© sur l‚Äôinstance, mais seulement en marquant le contenu concern√© comme sensible et en aucun cas sur un fil public.
5. Soyez gentil‚ãÖles les un‚ãÖes avec les autres.

info.short_description: Plural Caf√© is a community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike.
info.full_description: Welcome to the Plural Caf√©! Grab a hot cocoa or coffee from the bar, kick back and relax. This is a Mastodon instance that is focused around fostering a friendly and welcoming community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike. The primary goal is to provide a sense of support and community around plural systems.

info.short_description: Open discussion but skewed toward the topics of technology, information security, privacy, and their political implications.
info.full_description: Free Radical is our social media haven. It's where we talk in an inviting, respectful setting where we can set our own boundaries. We'd love for you to join us!

info.short_description: ◊ê
info.full_description:
Welcome to the ◊ê community!

First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

- The respect of others is primary.
- This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.
- Each user is responsible of their account.

Rules of Aleph.land

You can be suspended for:

- Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).
- Taking part of a harassment.
- Putting someone in danger.
- Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.
- Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

You can be muted from the public timelines for:

- Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:
    - nudity (#nude)
    - gore (#gore)
    - pornography (#porn)
    - a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)
    - spoil (#spoil)
- Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.
- Making abusive ads.
- Posting automatic toots from another source.

Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.
If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :) 

You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

info.short_description: Scifi.Fyi is a general-purpose mastodon instance that seeks to foster a welcoming and inclusive community!
info.full_description:
Scifi.Fyi is a general-purpose mastodon instance that seeks to foster a welcoming and inclusive community!

We run glitch-soc, a version of mastodon with experimental new features!
info.topic: General with a sprinkle of science fiction

info.short_description: An instance for all pony fans, and opened to everyone !
info.full_description: Equestria Social Network is a Mastodon instance for all pony fans, created to federate people of the MLP FiM fandom wanting to join the "fediverse", and those already present. But we are opened to everyone !
info.topic: Generalistic, but especially "MLP : FiM" and the Brony sub-culture.

info.short_description: This instance is for the free software lovers, the people who like to use GNU/Linux, programming and the rest. French/English. No moderation.
info.full_description: This instance is for the free software lovers, the people who like to use GNU/Linux, programming and the rest. French/English. No moderation. Everyone is welcome.

info.short_description: A friendly place in the fediverse for discussing music recordings.
info.full_description: Liner Notes Club is a Mastodon instance dedicated to providing fans of recorded music with a place to socialize and share their musical musings.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for Metal music fans. Hosted in Germany with 100% green energy.
info.full_description: A Mastodon instance for Metal music fans. This Mastodon instance addresses Metal music fans, but can be used by other users as well :-)

info.short_description: A free UK Instance.
info.full_description: This a free UK instance. But we welcome everyone!

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
info.full_description:
A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
Membership is restricted to students, alumni and employees of the University of Twente.
Content posted on this instance does not reflect the opinions or policies of the University of Twente.

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun üéâ

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: An instance for open source developers, free culture community and dreamers.
info.full_description:
Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

We are Nasqueron.

info.short_description: Exclusive or something
info.full_description: We are an international instance with no particular focus on any specific theme, a short and memorable domain, and a lightly moderated friendly community.

info.short_description: Welcome to the 8th Layer of Madness. Every human is welcome. Topics are mostly Linux, Anime, Music, Software, ...
info.full_description: "Don't be a dick", and really don't push it

info.short_description: This generalist Mastodon instance welcomes enthusiasts of the Pok√©mon franchise, to talk about it or anything else. Join the federation!
info.full_description:
Welcome to donphan.social!

We aim to provide a free and safe space for Pok√©fans of the federation, whether as a main general account to toot about anything, or for Pok√©mon-focused accounts to toot about anything related to the franchise.
